医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现可以彻底改变骨关节炎治疗的祖细胞研究人员报告称，骨关节炎是由 Gremlin 1 (Grem1) 谱系软骨祖细胞的丢失引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Scientists-identify-progenitor-cells-that-c​​ould-revolutionize-osteoarthritis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Scientists-identify-progenitor-cells-that-c​​ould-revolutionize-osteoarthritis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f40b7254-9ced-448f-9f74-f4ebde8f3df5 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 11:54:00 -0400 Scientists identify progenitor cells that could revolutionize osteoarthritis treatment
各州重新考虑儿童保育疫苗接种的宗教豁免在蒙大拿州比林斯附近的 Munchkin Land 日托所就读的儿童中，超过一半有特殊需要或免疫系统受损。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/States-reconsider-religious-exemptions-for-vaccinations-in-child-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/States-reconsider-religious-exemptions-for-vaccinations-in-child-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e8324f5-f68b-4c99-bf46-236c76147a7d Fri, 03 Nov 2023 06:56:02 -0400 States reconsider religious exemptions for vaccinations in child care
拜登选择领导社会保障承诺对“令人心碎”的追回采取行动乔·拜登总统提名的社会保障管理局局长周四向参议员们承诺，他将解决该机构因每年试图收回其错误地多付给受益人的数十亿美元而造成的困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Biden-pick-to-lead-social-security-pledges-action-on-e28098heartwritinge28099-clawbacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Biden-pick-to-lead-social-security-pledges-action-on-e28098heartwritinge28099-clawbacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fa5fa34-e5e3-4dc2-8311-1674de57c4cf Fri, 03 Nov 2023 06:54:34 -0400 Biden pick to lead social security pledges action on ‘heartbreaking’ clawbacks

研究表明，英国的儿童肥胖症可以通过系统干预得到遏制系统地提供肥胖管理干预措施对英格兰儿童肥胖患病率的潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Childhood-obesity-in-England-could-be-curbed-with-systematic-interventions-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Childhood-obesity-in-England-could-be-curbed-with-systematic-interventions-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f8ebae8-c851-415f-b962-20ad7933a5b1 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 06:11:00 -0400 Childhood obesity in England could be curbed with systematic interventions, study suggests
AZoNetwork推出AZoAI，人工智能行业开放接入平台领先的科学出版商推出了其第 12 个特定主题网站 AZoAI.com - 人工智能的 A to Z。该网站宣传和介绍人工智能的应用将如何影响科学、工程和医疗保健领域，并为这些领域的行业专家提供人工智能和机器学习行业的最新新闻和内容。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/AZoNetwork-launches-AZoAI-an-open-access-platform-for-the-artificial-intelligence-industry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/AZoNetwork-launches-AZoAI-an-open-access-platform-for-the-artificial-intelligence-industry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99a1140f-f25e-450b-b9b0-b288ddf485d6 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 05:50:00 -0400 AZoNetwork launches AZoAI, an open - access platform for the artificial intelligence industry

延时图像显示镁离子如何协调 CRISPR-Cas9 中的双链断裂被称为 CRISPR 的基因编辑技术给农业、健康研究等领域带来了革命性的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Time-lapsed-images-show-how-magnesium-ions-coordinate-double-stranded-breaks-in-CRISPR-Cas9.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Time-lapsed-images-show-how-magnesium-ions-coordinate-double-stranded-breaks-in-CRISPR-Cas9.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31360dc3-7a15-490f-99a9-c76992477d18 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 23:57:35 -0400 Time-lapsed images show how magnesium ions coordinate double-stranded breaks in CRISPR-Cas9
改变肠道微生物群可以改善高血压肾损伤和炎症对啮齿动物的新研究表明，改变肠道微生物可能会影响与高血压相关的器官损伤的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Modifying-the-gut-microbiota-can-ameliorate-hypertential-kidney-damage-and-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Modifying-the-gut-microbiota-can-ameliorate-hypertential-kidney-damage-and-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=156d9634-ba04-4009-9aad-db3fae34dffa Thu, 02 Nov 2023 23:51:55 -0400 Modifying the gut microbiota can ameliorate hypertensive kidney damage and inflammation
平衡行为：在不影响营养的情况下应对过敏儿童的消除饮食最近的研究强调了对食物过敏儿童仔细管理消除饮食、确保营养平衡和支持生长的重要性。该研究提倡采用多学科方法来帮助儿童避免过敏原，而不损害他们的整体健康和发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Balancing-act-Navigating-elimination-diets-in-allergic-kids-without-compromising-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Balancing-act-Navigating-elimination-diets-in-allergic-kids-without-compromising-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d11e72a0-10ff-4758-b6ae-069f57e8ae8c Thu, 02 Nov 2023 23:24:00 -0400 Balancing act: Navigating elimination diets in allergic kids without compromising nutrition
